channel.title: Taylor Riemersma's Work
channel.description: Recent content on Taylor Riemersma's Work

item.title: Baylor to Win the Title
item.description: In the quest to create a perfect bracket using code, I, along with others, created code to create the best bracket there could be. As seen by this point, this has not gone exactly as planned. However as of Monday evening, this bracket held me in the 97.2 percentile of brackets on ESPN. That would not last for long. After writing this Monday night, things drasticaly changed. Colorado fell.

item.title: About Taylor Riemersma
item.description: This May I’ll graduate from the University of Nebraska-Lincoln with a Bachelor of Journalism degree in Sports Media and Communication. I currently work in the Department of Nebraska Athletics Communications Department and as a tutor. Soon, I will take on the position of being an official for intramural flag football as well here at UNL. My R Studio skills are still developing as I am in my second coding class, but I’m always eager to learn more and improve my abilities.
